title: Grand Opening: Mercure Doncaster Stay just 30 Minutes from Melbourne CBD with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Be one of the first to experience the stylish Mercure Melbourne Doncaster, a brand-new urban oasis in Melbourne's northeastern suburbs. The location of this elegant hideaway is nothing short of superb, and it sits directly opposite Westfield Doncaster while boasting excellent views of the stunning Yarra Ranges and CBD in the distance. You'll be moments away from a world-class collection of shops and restaurants, but close enough to reach the city centre located just a short drive away.

The hotel offers opulent facilities including a shimmering indoor/outdoor rooftop pool and Chido Chido Bar and Cantina located onsite and offering flavour-packed Mexican fare. For a well-deserved drink after hours of shopping up a storm, the terrace beckons with uninterrupted vistas that stretch far into the horizon.

title: Contemporary Mercure Doncaster Stay next to Westfield Shopping Precinct with Daily Breakfast
description:
Discover a stylish award-winning urban oasis perfectly positioned in Melbourne's northeastern suburbs. Sitting directly opposite Westfield Doncaster, with 430 stores including Myer, David Jones, and Village Cinemas, this Mercure hotel boasts excellent views of the stunning Yarra Ranges and the CBD, all while being just moments away from a world-class collection of boutiques and restaurants.

The hotel offers fabulous facilities, including a shimmering indoor/outdoor rooftop pool, a modern onsite restaurant and a rooftop bar. For a well-deserved drink after hours of shopping up a storm, the terrace beckons with uninterrupted vistas that stretch far into the horizon.

title: Stylish Mercure Doncaster Escape next to Westfield Shopping Precinct with Rooftop Bar & Tranquil Pool
description:
Tucked away in Melbourne's northeastern suburbs, this award-winning Mercure sanctuary is ideally situated near Westfield Doncaster's shopping boutiques and eateries. Soak up views of the Yarra Ranges from this stylish hotel, explore cobblestone lanes and indulge in the region's epic culinary scene, especially in nearby Box Hill, a hub of Asian cuisine and culture.

Back at your hotel, enjoy a refreshing dip in the shimmering indoor/outdoor rooftop pool, tuck into modern Australian delicacies at the onsite restaurant and sip on signature cocktails at the rooftop bar. For a well-deserved drink after hours of urban exploration, the terrace beckons with uninterrupted views that stretch far into the horizon.
offer_address: 6 Tower Street, Doncaster, Melbourne, Victoria 3108, Australia
